features: SmartSteam Technology - Take the guesswork out of ironing. SmartSteam automatically optimizes steam levels based on the temperature you select for each type of garment.
Stainless Steel Soleplate - The durable soleplate glides smoothly across all ironable fabrics.
3-Way Auto Shutoff - For added peace of mind, the iron shuts off when left unattended for 30 seconds on its side or soleplate, and after 8 minutes on the heel rest.
Anti-Drip - The iron is engineered to prevent dripping by closely regulating water temperatures.
Spray Mist - The push-button mister helps moisten fabrics to quickly smooth away deep wrinkles.
body.description: Ironing is truly a breeze with the BLACK+DECKER™ Light ‘N Easy™ Compact Steam Iron. The heavy-duty technology inside this lightweight electric iron removes wrinkles in no time. SmartSteam™ Technology puts temperature and steam controls in one easy-to-use dial, giving you perfect settings for any type of fabric. Plus, the stainless steel soleplate provides durability and the 3-way auto shutoff delivers peace of mind with every use.

BLACK+DECKER Light ‘N Easy Compact Steam Iron, IR1020S Ironing is truly a breeze with the BLACK+DECKER Light ‘N Easy Compact Steam Iron. The heavy-duty technology inside this lightweight electric iron removes wrinkles in no time. SmartSteam Technology puts temperature and steam controls in one easy-to-use dial, giving you perfect settings for any type of fabric. Plus, the stainless steel soleplate provides durability and the 3-way auto shutoff delivers peace of mind with every use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This iron is working well for me so far.
reviews.reviewText: After my old iron I've had for 15+ years starting leaking water, I searched for a replacement. I chose this model because it's not too big and not too small, and I didn't want anything digital or complicated. I've had irons with non-stick surfaces before, and the non-stick surface always comes off; therefore; I was interested in trying the stainless steel surface. So far, it glides easily over clothes. My last iron had a retractable cord which was tricky to retract and in recent years would retract if I bumped it when I was ironing (very frustrating); therefore, I was happy to have a cord that I could just wind around the base. Winding the cord around the base is working well for me. The iron gets much hotter than my old model, and the steam is good. Like all irons I've ever used, it does drip water at times. It's fine with me that the steam is automatic at high temperatures. If I ever need to use it at high temps without steam, I just won't put water in the reservoir. It is difficult to see the water level in the reservoir, but I can live with that. I need to put on my glasses and shine my phone flashlight on it to see the water level. It took me a while to figure out the rhyme and reason of when the red light comes on; it has something to do with the resetting the internal timer for the automatic shutoff feature. I would rather just see the red light on when the iron is turned on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Iron. Hard to read setting values placed under the handle.
reviews.reviewText: Iron is light weight and has safety features. The settings dial is somewhat hard to read as the numerals are small. The explanation for the numbers is placed under the handle, so they are very hard to see when using the iron. I am happy with the iron, just can't see some numbers and words when using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't go wrong with this brand
reviews.reviewText: I have been using B&D appliances for a long time, and have always been satisfied. Whenever a problem has arisen, B&D customer service has solved it for me. This is an entry level, no frills iron that will do its job well. Can iron dry or with steam. Did not come with the small plastic cup to fill it, but that is not a deal breaker. Cord is a reasonable length. Good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but powerful iron!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small iron for a secondary laundry for guests and occasional use. This iron is perfect! Lightweight but effective and like that it is a steam iron in a compact size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Iron I have been looking for
reviews.reviewText: I really love the stainless steel soleplate design! As compared to many of the non-stick soleplate, stainless steel is definitely more environmentally friendly. In addition, the light-weight feature helps to move the iron more easily. Price is also affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how sturdy and heavy this is it's the best I've ever bought!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The heat turns off but the light doesn’t.
reviews.reviewText: The heat turns off but the light doesn’t. Left this thing plugged in all day and night just to see if the whole thing will shut off but it doesn’t. the light will be blinking until you unplug it Just to remind you to unplug the damn thing. In a stand up position it takes 20 to 25 minutes to completely cool down. I left it plug-in for 24 hours just to see what it will do but it did not turn back on.
Nice good iron, no mess or water drip.
Great safety features so you can use it with confidence...it will shut off automatically after 8 minutes if unattended .
La plancha es buena, pero el precio publicado aquí en Amazon es muy elevado para este producto ..En bodega Aurrerá, Walmart está en menos de $400MXN
I like the weight of the product but it was larger than I expected. Also the dial sticks when I try to move it into the steam range.
